jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a full stack developer with experience in React and Node.js. The candidate will work on building and maintaining our e-commerce platform.

jobs.title: Senior Python Developer
jobs.description: ABC Corp. is seeking a senior Python developer to work on our data analytics platform. The candidate should have experience with Pandas and NumPy.

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
jobs.description: DEF Inc. is looking for a cloud engineer with experience in AWS and Azure. The candidate will be responsible for maintaining and scaling our cloud infrastructure.

jobs.title: AI Engineer
jobs.description: GHI Inc. is seeking an AI engineer with experience in TensorFlow and PyTorch.
